name: Microsoft Word MIME HTML Document
summary: Learn about .DOCMHTML files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft Word no longer supports the DOCMHTML format. Instead, Word provides save options for .MHTML and .MHT files, which are more widely supported by web browsers and other programs.
NOTE: To create a webpage version of a document in Word 365, select File â†’ Save As, then choose the "Single File Web Page (*.mht, *.mhtml)" option from the dropdown menu.

description: A DOCMHTML file is an old variant of web archive saved by the earlier versions of Microsoft Word. It is no more supported by the latest version of Microsoft Word. A DOCMHTML file contains HTML representation of the original .doc word document. It can be opened in Microsoft Word as well as in web browser. When a DOCMHTML is published, it can be hosted on a web server that is accessible to users via web request. Another similar format is DOCHTML that has also been discontinued.

A DOCMHTML file is an archived MIME HTML document saved by earlier versions of Microsoft Word, a word processing application. It contains HTML source code that represents the document in a format similar to the original .DOC file. DOCMHTML files are used for viewing published versions of documents in a Web browser.

instructions: Unfortunately, there are no known applications that fully support the DOCMHTML format since Microsoft Word dropped support for it.
